task.title: Bundle, Upload, and Register an Image with Eucalyptus

context.p: Once you've customized or acquaired an image to use with Eucalyput, you must enable an image as an executable entity. To do that, you must do the following:

ol.li: Bundle a root disk image and kernel/ramdisk pair
Upload the bundled image to Walrus bucket storage

context.note: Note that while all users can bundle, upload and register images, only users under the administrator account have the required permissions to upload and register kernels and ramdisks.
context.p: Once you have an image that meets your needs, perform the tasks listed in this section to add the image to your cloud.
